meanings.sent1: She parameterized the equation to make it easier to solve.
meanings.sent2: The software allows users to parameterize their search criteria.
meanings.sent3: The chef parameterized the recipe by adjusting the ingredients.
meanings.sent4: His speech was parameterized with technical jargon to impress the audience.
meanings.sent5: The artist parameterized the colors in the painting to create a harmonious composition.

meanings.definition: Determine or set the parameters of.
meanings.sent1: They parameterized the experiment to control the variables.
meanings.sent2: The engineer parameterized the system for optimal performance.
meanings.sent3: The teacher parameterized the test to challenge the students.
meanings.sent4: The coach parameterized the training program for each athlete's needs.
meanings.sent5: The doctor parameterized the treatment plan based on the patient's condition.
